summary: The Asia Trade Show is taking place on 8/12/25. Investors are focusing on a potential rate cut in the coming months as AUSTRALIA's RESERVE BANK will deliver a 25-basis POINT REDUCTION. argos_summary: Investors are closely watching for clues on potential interest rate cuts as Australia's Reserve Bank is expected to announce a 25 basis point reduction. In the U.S., markets closed lower amid thin volumes ahead of upcoming CPI data, with expectations of a 2% year-over-year increase. President Trump has extended the U.S.-China trade truce for 90 days, allowing for negotiations on tariffs and chip sales, while also considering candidates to replace Fed Chair Jay Powell.
